Description:
The small and alluring island of Bimini is in the north of the Bahamas, just a 20-minute flight east of Florida. Several airlines operate on a daily basis from there to Bimini. The airport, located on South Bimini, is a short taxi- and water taxi ride away from the resort, which is located on the northern part of the island.

This resort is the perfect tropical getaway for those with a passion for fishing or those who love to escape the routine and experience the best of Mother Nature. The resort was designed with Bahamian-style architecture in the typical pastel colours found throughout the Caribbean. All accommodation units feature cool granite and tile throughout, rattan, shell and coral accents and a full kitchen. The resort has a friendly neighbourhood ambience and caters to all types of guests, especially families with children.

All guest rooms are designed with 'beach chic' décor and are beautifully appointed with such amenities as oversized couches with a contemporary feel, granite kitchen countertops and porcelain top stoves. Standard in-room amenities include coffee and a coffee maker, a refrigerator, microwave, iron and ironing board, extra linen and a washer/dryer. Furthermore, all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a television, high-speed Internet access (at an additional cost) and AM/FM clock radio.

The resort offers three excellent options for dining: a Mediterranean-inspired restaurant offering French/Mediterranean infusion cuisine, a casual poolside restaurant and a gourmet Italian bistro that offers indoor and al fresco seating.

Address: BIMINI ISLAND BIMINI ISLANDS
Description:
The small and alluring island of Bimini is in the north of the Bahamas, just a 20-minute flight east of Florida. Several airlines operate on a daily basis from there to Bimini. The airport, located on South Bimini, is a short taxi- and water taxi ride away from the resort, which is located on the northern part of the island.

This resort is the perfect tropical getaway for those with a passion for fishing or those who love to escape the routine and experience the best of Mother Nature. The resort was designed with Bahamian-style architecture in the typical pastel colours found throughout the Caribbean. All accommodation units feature cool granite and tile throughout, rattan, shell and coral accents and a full kitchen. The resort has a friendly neighbourhood ambience and caters to all types of guests, especially families with children.

All guest rooms are designed with 'beach chic' décor and are beautifully appointed with such amenities as oversized couches with a contemporary feel, granite kitchen countertops and porcelain top stoves. Standard in-room amenities include coffee and a coffee maker, a refrigerator, microwave, iron and ironing board, extra linen and a washer/dryer. Furthermore, all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a television, high-speed Internet access (at an additional cost) and AM/FM clock radio.

The resort offers three excellent options for dining: a Mediterranean-inspired restaurant offering French/Mediterranean infusion cuisine, a casual poolside restaurant and a gourmet Italian bistro that offers indoor and al fresco seating.
